summary: Versatile Data Analyst, QA Engineer, and Software/C++ Developer with 3+ years across QA automation, BI reporting, IT support, and full-stack development. Skilled in Python, SQL, Power BI, Tableau, modern C++, and tools like Cypress, Postman, JMeter, and Git. Known for validating data, expanding test coverage, and building dashboards and tools that make technical systems easier to understand and trust.

bullets: Resolved 550+ support tickets, diagnosing hardware, software, and account issues and reducing resolution time by ~30%.
Assisted students and staff with DUO and Microsoft Authenticator setup, PIN resets, and secure account recovery.
Installed and configured software such as Microsoft 365, SPSS, and virtual machines; performed basic hardware repairs (RAM, drives, batteries).
Updated and maintained the AI chatbot knowledge base, improving answer accuracy and reducing manual workload by ~25%.
Documented tickets, repairs, and recurring issues, and contributed to simple Excel/Power BI reports on ticket trends and resolution KPIs.
Guided students through Python labs on loops, functions, OOP, and problem-solving patterns; provided debugging support in real time.
Evaluated and provided feedback on 50+ assignments, emphasizing readable, maintainable code and clear logic.
Helped students connect core programming concepts to data analysis and automation use cases.
Conducted manual and automated testing for a global EdTech platform, covering web UI, APIs, and data pipelines.
Led frontend automation using Cypress.js, expanding regression coverage by ~35% and reducing manual regression effort.
Designed SQL queries and data checks to validate reporting accuracy and cross-verify analytics data with source systems.
Managed API and performance testing with Postman, Swagger, JMeter/K6 and integrated suites into CI/CD pipelines.
Collaborated with developers and business stakeholders in Agile/JIRA workflows to triage defects, plan hotfixes, and improve user experience.
Executed functional and regression testing for a healthcare analytics platform with complex workflows and data flows.
Translated requirements and user stories into detailed test cases with strong coverage of edge cases and data validation.
Partnered with engineering and product teams to refine workflows, log clear defects, and support faster resolution cycles.
Performed functional and regression testing for financial web applications, focusing on core transactions and security flows.
Supported early Selenium-based UI automation efforts and basic performance and hardware testing.
Learned defect lifecycle, SDLC, and documentation best practices in a structured QA environment.
